get.summary: Gets an array of org units with attests.

parameters.name: isPayPeriodNotExistCondition
parameters.description:
Specify if {payPeriodFrom} or {payPeriodTill} specified.
Values:
False: will fetch org units WITH payroll export period form passed dates,
e.g. (orgUnitId = 1 AND from = "2010-12-31" AND till = "2011-01-15").
True: will fetch org units WITHOUT payroll export period form passed dates,
e.g. NOT (orgUnitId = 1 AND NOT (from = "2010-12-31" AND till = "2011-01-15")).
Null: no pey period restrictions, will select org units both WITH and WITHOUT payroll export periods.
Nullable boolean, optional, the default value is Null.

parameters.name: payPeriodFrom
parameters.description:
Exact start period date of pay period,
date (e.g. "2010-12-31"), optional.

parameters.name: payPeriodTill
parameters.description:
Exact end period date of pay period,
date (e.g. "2011-01-15"), optional.

from the database, otherwise all the relatives will be kept.

only the "Employee" role will be removed but the person will be kept.

post.summary: Adds an employee to organizational unit relation

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
OrgUnit - org untit ID, number greater than zero, mandatory.

EmplNo - existing employee number, alphanumeric, mandatory (if PersonId is not provided).

PersonId - existing person ID, mandatory (if EmplNo is not provided).

PayrollOrgUnit - person's home org unit ID, optional (should already be in the DB).
PayrollOrgUnit == OrgUnit indicates a person-home-org-unit relation.

EmplSpeedCode - employee speed code, number, optional (will be autogenerated if not provided or zero).

InclPayroll,
InclPayrollReport,
InclPrintOut,
InclPlan,
InclReg,
InclHist,
InclBudggetActualsCalc
- bool flags, optional (will be assigned false if omitted).

post.summary:
Add or update the tenant icon. If an icon already exists, it will be changed.
To check the current icon associated to a tenant you can simply check the following address:
sandbox: https://sandbox-static.kivra.com/img/tenant/{tenantKey}/icon.png
production: https://static.kivra.com/img/tenant/{tenantKey}/icon.png
The icon needs to be provided according to the following format:
     * Dimensions: squared icon with size between 256x256 px and 512x512 px
     * Alpha Channel: 32-bits
     * Format: PNG
     * File size: up to 1MB
We recommend to leave a little white area around the logo, to provide the best experience for the users.

get.summary: Gets an array of regs (a.k.a. stamps, punches)

parameters.name: personIds
parameters.description:
{personIds} - an array of person IDs.
Could have one to ten person IDs.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description:
{from} - start date-time.
Should be specified if {till} is not provided.

parameters.name: till
parameters.description:
{till} - end date-time.
Should be specified if {from} is not provided.
If both {from} and {till} are specified,
({from}, {till}) interval should be less than fifty days.

parameters.name: regSet
parameters.description:
{regSet} values:
1: Select all current regs with the respective ("left-joined") orig regs;
2: Select all orig regs with the respective ("left-joined") current regs;
3: Select all current and orig regs ("full-joined") - default value., Possible values:
    1: Select all current regs with the respective ("left-joined") orig regs
    2: Select all orig regs with the respective ("left-joined") current regs
    3: Select all current and orig regs ("full-joined")

type.description:

    0: First-in agreement type

    2: Break agreement type
    3: Overtime agreement type

code.description:
Internal error code
  Possible values:
    1: Invalid authorization token
    2: Insufficient permissions
    3: Operation is not allowed
    4: Failed to perform operation
    5: Operation is already performed
    6: Invalid parameter value
    7: Inconsistent data
    8: Value has incorrect format
    9: Conflict occurred
    10: Entity not found
    11: Entity already exists
    12: Invalid period
    13: Employee(s) not found
    14: Employment period not found
    15: Employment periods overlap
    16: Invalid social security number
    17: Missing dimension value
    18: Uknown currency code
    19: Missing personal information
    20: Person's relative not found
    21: Spell of work not found
    22: Data is locked by another user
    23: Data is in read-only state due to "Edit reservation" lock
    24: Data is attested and not available for modification
    25: Digital document is already signed
    26: Attempt to modify hidden dimensions
